column2: "Hm? That outfit? You must be in ARKS!"
"I've also wanted to be in ARKS!"
"But wanted is past tense. I have no natural ability for controlling photons."
"It's too bad, but there's not much I can do about it. ARKS is kinda strict like that."
"But there's not much I can do about it, so I just have to move on."
"More than that what annoys me is my friend!"
"He's a coward and a sissy and yet he started talking about getting into ARKS."
"On top of that, he took the exam and actually had talent, so he got in!"
"I wonder if he'll get by on his own? I don't see him very often so I'm kind of concerned."
